teal.physics.physical

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.core.AbstractElement
      • teal.render.Rendered
        • teal.sim.SimRendered
          • teal.sim.engine.EngineRendered
            • teal.physics.physical.PhysicalObject
              • teal.physics.physical.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, HasID, Referenced, TElement, THasPropertyChange, TUpdatable, Integratable, GeneratesG, HasBoundingArea, HasColor, HasDirection, HasFog, HasNode3D, HasPosition, HasRotation, IsMoveable, IsPickable, TAbstractRendered, TDrawable, TRendered, HasCollisionController, Constrainable, HasSimEngine, HasMass, HasMomentOfInertia, HasVelocity, PhysicalElement, TSimElement

    public class Ball
extends PhysicalObject
implements GeneratesG
    The Ball class represents a spherical PhysicalObject that feels only gravitational effects. Unlike most objects, it is automatically fitted with a SphereCollisionController.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
